alreadyLoggedOut: You are already logged out. You can log in again
loginRequired: You must be logged in to delete users
errorUploadingFile: There was an issue uploading the file
mustBeLoggedInToUploadFiles: You must be logged in to upload files
errorSavingFileToDatabase: There was an issue saving the file to the database
errorGettingFiles: There was an issue retrieving the files
mustBeLoggedInToViewFiles: You must be logged in to view your files
errorGettingUserFiles: There was an issue retrieving the user's files
mustBeLoggedInToDeleteFiles: You must be logged in to delete files
errorDeletingFile: There was an issue deleting the file
errorDeletingAllFiles: There was an issue deleting all files
